update() - Method in class executeMain.DataStorage
This method performs UPDATE to the follows Company, customer and coupon.
upDateCompany(Company) - Method in interface dbDAO.CompanyDAO
this anAbstractMethod that bound to do an update for company.
upDateCompany(Company) - Method in class dbDAO.CompanyDBDAO
this method is updating the password and the email of the company using fields that received in the company instance according to the company name that also received in the same instance.
updateCompany - Static variable in class dbDAO.SqlQueries
 
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
this method gives instruction for CompanyDBDAOclass to update a company in the DB it receiving a company instance and conductor it to the update method in CompanyDBDAO class
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in interface dbDAO.CouponDAO
this anAbstractMethod that bound to do an update for coupon.
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class dbDAO.CouponDBDAO
The method updateCoupon using UpdaterDBDAOclass to updating end date and price.
updateCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
This method gives instruction for CouponDBDAOclass to update a coupon in the DB it receiving a coupon instance and conductor it to the updateCoupon method in CouponDBDAO class

this anAbstractMethod that bound to do an update for customer.
updateCustomer(Customer) - Method in class dbDAO.CustomerDBDAO

updateCustomer - Static variable in class dbDAO.SqlQueries
